text: Ammavanu Pattiya Amali is a 1989 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Augustine Prakash, starring Mukesh and Thilakan in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Mukesh as Suresh * Thilakan as Sreedaramenon * KPAC Lalitha as Sethulakshmi * T. G. Ravi as Narayanan * Lizy as Sulojana * Innocent as Ravunni * Kuthiravattam Pappu as Kuttan Nair * Lalu Alex as Sreeni * Jagathy Sreekumar as Johnson * Mala Aravindan Thomson * Kundara Johnny as Vasu * K. P. A. C. Sunny * Unnimary as Barghavi * Thodupuzha Vasanthi * Aloor Elsy * Disco Shanti * Sugandhi ==Soundtrack== The music was composed by A. T. Ummer and the lyrics were written by M. D. Rajendran {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" ! No. !! Song !! Singers !! Lyrics |- | 1 || "Melle Melle" || Uma Maheswari || M. D. Rajendran |- | 2 || "Neelappooviriyum" || Minmini || M. D. Rajendran |- | 3 || "Thennalin Therileri" ||G. Venugopal, Ashalatha || M. D. Rajendran |- | 4 || "Thoovaanam Pulki Pulki" || K. J. Yesudas || M. D. title: Ammavanu Pattiya Amali
